content: this crochet blanket is a bright and cheerful addition to your home boasting a rainbow of shades from caron one pound pattern is worked back and forth in row featuring 3d flowers that are stitched right into the throw so there s minimal finishing pattern is also great for sharpening your skills in double_crochet long double_crochet stitches stitching crocheted flowers and working a border in the round it s the blanket that s perfect to refresh any space yarns for model caron® one pound ™ 16 oz/453 6 g 812 yds/742 m contrast a off white 10514 2 balls contrast b grass green 10620 1 ball contrast c sunflower 10549 1 ball contrast d soft sage 10580 1 ball contrast e lilac 10577 1 ball contrast f dark pink 10621 1 ball
